```{r setup, include = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message = FALSE)

library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)

pib <- readxl::read_excel(
  here::here('static/pib_files/pib_1870_2011_iecon.xls'),
  sheet='Series') %>% 
  rename(year = 1,
         pib_corriente = 2,
         pib_constante = 3,
         pib_per_capita = 4)


str(pib)

```
```{r}
pib %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, pib_constante)) + 
  geom_line()
```


```{r}

plot_ly(pib, x=~year, y=~pib_per_capita) %>% 
  add_lines() %>% 
  rangeslider()
```
